gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ThreeD
Interface IPixelShape

All Known Implementing Classes:
PixelParallelogram, PixelPolymarker, PixelPositionedBox
public interface IPixelShape

This interface is intended for shapes that will be used to draw detector pixels in a 3D scene. Implementing classes should hold a value and id for the pixel.

Method Summary
 int getPixelID()
          Return pixel's id.
 float getValue()
          Return pixel's value.
 void setValue(float value)
          Set the current value of the pixel.
